Functions

00300_mcMallocWsm
[Normal_Client_API]

Test Scenario for tbase Driver API function mcMallocWsm()
More...

Functions

 TestCase_GC00100_IdDefault4k ()

 TestCase_GC00109_AllocateTillOom () 2)

Detailed Description

Test Scenario for tbase Driver API function mcMallocWsm()

Involved Components and their required Functionality

  1. ClientLib
    1. Can connect to daemon
    2. Can reserve memory for connection
  2. McDriverDaemon
    1. Daemon running
    2. Daemon socket accessible by TLC
    3. mcOpenDevice()
  3. McDriverModule
    1. Module loaded
    2. Module socket accessible by daemon
    3. Module listens for connection

Generic preconditions (setup)
Generic Preconditions are the same for every test case. They are executed always in front of every single test case.

  • open device using the default ID by calling mcOpenDevice()

Generic post processing (teardown)
Generic post processing is the same for every test case. It is executed always after every single test case.

  • free allocated memory by calling mcFreeWsm() if it has been allocated
  • close Device by calling mcCloseDevice()

Function Documentation

TestCase_GC00100_IdDefault4k (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Pre Conditions:
A device has been opened using the default ID in Generic preconditions (setup)
Focus:
mcMallocWsm(MC_DEVICE_ID_DEFAULT, 0, 4096, &tci, 0)
Test Steps:
TLC allocates 4kB of WSM
Verification:
MC_DRV_OK is returned
Post Conditions:
none
Manual Execution:
No

Yes
Final Device Testcase:
Yes
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
Yes
Quick Testcase:
No

TestCase_GC00107_StresstestMultipleAllocations (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Pre Conditions:
A device has been opened using the default ID in Generic preconditions (setup)
Focus:
call mcMallocWsm several times allocating blocks of 4kB
Test Steps:
TLC calls mcMallocWsm 16 times
After that, the memory (available to the TLC) is exhausted.
After that, the TLC frees the memory again.
Several runs of this test should not leak any other memory
Verification:
MC_DRV_OK is returned until no more memory is available then
MC_DRV_ERR_NO_FREE_MEMORY is returned.
Post Conditions:
All memory is freed again by calling mcFreeWsm(), no memory leaks occur
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
Yes
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
Yes
Quick Testcase:
No
Test ID:
Normal_Client_API.00300_mcMallocWsm.GC00107_StresstestMultipleAllocations
TestCase_GC00109_AllocateTillOom (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Pre Conditions:
Involved components running and functioning
Focus:
Check if running out of WSM memory results in instability of some kind
Test Steps:
TLC allocate WSM memory in loop, till it runs out of free memory
Verification:
Process does not crashes in event of out of memory
Post Conditions:
none
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
No
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
No
Basic Testcase:
Yes
Quick Testcase:
No
Test ID:
